article_title: Bombardier Raises Size of Equity Offering to C$938 Million
article_text:
Bombardier Inc. on Friday raised the size of its planned equity offering to 938 million Canadian dollars ($751 million) from the C$750 million announced Thursday, underscoring the strong demand that remains for shares of the Canadian plane and train maker.

Last week, Bombardier said it was aiming to raise up to $2.1 billion through the issue of both debt and equity to bolster a balance sheet that has taken a hit in recent months as...
